title: My game keeps crashing and repairing and I'm getting punished for it :(
body:
Hey guys,

I rarely leave games. Actually I don't think I've left a game in months, and only then it was for something very urgent in real life.
I'm just a guy that loves playing support for the most part. I'm not that good or anything, but I do enjoy playing the game.

Recently, I've been having a series of events where my game crashes and "bugsplat" pops up demanding that I repair the game.
So I sit and wait to repair the game, and long behold, when I log back in I get punished by low priority que.

This happened to me once before, I got put into the 5min que.

Now I'm getting put into the 10min que.

I don't know if I'll get any help here, but this is really unfair and I wouldn't mind some help trying to fix this problem.

Thanks for reading
-Aqua

replies.body:
If your game assets are continuously becoming corrupted, I recommend ensuring you've configured League to operate with the right administrative privileges. Check out our [permissions guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) for a list of common steps to help with this.

Let me know if this helped resolve your issue.
To add on to that, I'm actually scared to go into matchmaking cause I don't know if I'll get banned or something if it crashes again.
